title: 2021: Inflation, Vaccinations & the Great Resignation
description:
Morning Brew managing editor Neal Freyman stops by to chat with Nora and Scott about the stories that dominated the newsletter in 2021. 
Check them out here: 

NFTs: Frequently Asked Questions

Inside Growing Calls to Boycott the 2022 Beijing Winter Olympics


Traditional IPO vs SPAC: Everything You Need to Know About Taking Your Company Public 

Hot Rod Charlie and His Five Best Human Friends Have Big Kentucky Derby Dreams

How to Write a Cover Letter and Not Hate the Process


Morning Brew's Work Horror Stories,


Full transcripts for all Business Casual episodes available at https://businesscasual.fm
